title: Lag since the last patch
body: What's going on with this lag since the last patch Riot? Normal ping but lots of "iceskating" (sliding around without the animation) champ happening with weird delays on abilities. I've spoken to a lot of people who are experiencing this. Any official word on this?

replies.body: Same issue. Lots of ice skating, lots of reconnecting, Everything works well until the first 30 seconds of a game then all hell breaks loose and I am playing blind/ not at all. I have never had these issues before and nothing has changed except the patch update.
